15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <inttypes.h>
20#include <stdbool.h>
21
22#include <isc/magic.h>
23#include <isc/mem.h>
24#include <isc/stats.h>
25#include <isc/util.h>
26
27#include <dns/opcode.h>
28#include <dns/rdatatype.h>
29#include <dns/stats.h>
30
31#define DNS_STATS_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('D', 's', 't', 't')
32#define DNS_STATS_VALID(x) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(x, DNS_STATS_MAGIC)
33
34/*%
35 * Statistics types.
36 */
37typedef enum {
38 dns_statstype_general = 0,
39 dns_statstype_rdtype = 1,
40 dns_statstype_rdataset = 2,
41 dns_statstype_opcode = 3,
42 dns_statstype_rcode = 4
43} dns_statstype_t;
44
45/*%
46 * It doesn't make sense to have 2^16 counters for all possible types since
47 * most of them won't be used. We have counters for the first 256 types and
48 * those explicitly supported in the rdata implementation.
49 * XXXJT: this introduces tight coupling with the rdata implementation.
50 * Ideally, we should have rdata handle this type of details.
51 */
52/*
53 * types, !types, nxdomain, stale types, stale !types, stale nxdomain
54 */
55enum {
56 /* For 0-255, we use the rdtype value as counter indices */
57 rdtypecounter_dlv = 256, /* for dns_rdatatype_dlv */
58 rdtypecounter_others = 257, /* anything else */
59 rdtypecounter_max = 258,
60 /* The following are used for rdataset */
61 rdtypenxcounter_max = rdtypecounter_max * 2,
62 rdtypecounter_nxdomain = rdtypenxcounter_max,
63 /* stale counters offset */
64 rdtypecounter_stale = rdtypecounter_nxdomain + 1,
65 rdatasettypecounter_max = rdtypecounter_stale * 2
66};
67
68struct dns_stats {
69 /*% Unlocked */
70 unsigned int magic;
71 dns_statstype_t type;
72 isc_mem_t *mctx;
73 isc_mutex_t lock;
74 isc_stats_t *counters;
75
76 /*% Locked by lock */
77 unsigned int references;
78};
79
80typedef struct rdatadumparg {
81 dns_rdatatypestats_dumper_t fn;
82 void *arg;
83} rdatadumparg_t;
84
85typedef struct opcodedumparg {
86 dns_opcodestats_dumper_t fn;
87 void *arg;
88} opcodedumparg_t;
89
90typedef struct rcodedumparg {
91 dns_rcodestats_dumper_t fn;
92 void *arg;
93} rcodedumparg_t;
94
95void
96dns_stats_attach(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_stats_t **statsp) {
97 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats));
98 REQUIRE(statsp != NULL && *statsp == NULL);
99
100 LOCK(&stats->lock);
101 stats->references++;
102 UNLOCK(&stats->lock);
103
104 *statsp = stats;
105}
106
107void
108dns_stats_detach(dns_stats_t **statsp) {
109 dns_stats_t *stats;
110
111 REQUIRE(statsp != NULL && DNS_STATS_VALID(*statsp));
112
113 stats = *statsp;
114 *statsp = NULL;
115
116 LOCK(&stats->lock);
117 stats->references--;
118 UNLOCK(&stats->lock);
119
120 if (stats->references == 0) {
121 isc_stats_detach(&stats->counters);
122 isc_mutex_destroy(&stats->lock);
123 isc_mem_putanddetach(&stats->mctx, stats, sizeof(*stats));
124 }
125}
126
127/*%
128 * Create methods
129 */
130static isc_result_t
131create_stats(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_statstype_t type, int ncounters,
132 dns_stats_t **statsp)
133{
134 dns_stats_t *stats;
135 isc_result_t result;
136
137 stats = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*stats));
138 if (stats == NULL)
139 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
140
141 stats->counters = NULL;
142 stats->references = 1;
143
144 isc_mutex_init(&stats->lock);
145
146 result = isc_stats_create(mctx, &stats->counters, ncounters);
147 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
148 goto clean_mutex;
149
150 stats->magic = DNS_STATS_MAGIC;
151 stats->type = type;
152 stats->mctx = NULL;
153 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &stats->mctx);
154 *statsp = stats;
155
156 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
157
158 clean_mutex:
159 isc_mutex_destroy(&stats->lock);
160 isc_mem_put(mctx, stats, sizeof(*stats));
161
162 return (result);
163}
164
165isc_result_t
166dns_generalstats_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_stats_t **statsp, int ncounters) {
167 REQUIRE(statsp != NULL && *statsp == NULL);
168
169 return (create_stats(mctx, dns_statstype_general, ncounters, statsp));
170}
171
172isc_result_t
173dns_rdatatypestats_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_stats_t **statsp) {
174 REQUIRE(statsp != NULL && *statsp == NULL);
175
176 return (create_stats(mctx, dns_statstype_rdtype, rdtypecounter_max,
177 statsp));
178}
179
180isc_result_t
181dns_rdatasetstats_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_stats_t **statsp) {
182 REQUIRE(statsp != NULL && *statsp == NULL);
183
184 return (create_stats(mctx, dns_statstype_rdataset,
185 rdatasettypecounter_max, statsp));
186}
187
188isc_result_t
189dns_opcodestats_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_stats_t **statsp) {
190 REQUIRE(statsp != NULL && *statsp == NULL);
191
192 return (create_stats(mctx, dns_statstype_opcode, 16, statsp));
193}
194
195isc_result_t
196dns_rcodestats_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_stats_t **statsp) {
197 REQUIRE(statsp != NULL && *statsp == NULL);
198
199 return (create_stats(mctx, dns_statstype_rcode,
200 dns_rcode_badcookie + 1, statsp));
201}
202
203/*%
204 * Increment/Decrement methods
205 */
206void
207dns_generalstats_increment(dns_stats_t *stats, isc_statscounter_t counter) {
208 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) && stats->type == dns_statstype_general);
209
210 isc_stats_increment(stats->counters, counter);
211}
212
213void
214dns_rdatatypestats_increment(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_rdatatype_t type) {
215 int counter;
216
217 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) && stats->type == dns_statstype_rdtype);
218
219 if (type == dns_rdatatype_dlv)
220 counter = rdtypecounter_dlv;
221 else if (type > dns_rdatatype_any)
222 counter = rdtypecounter_others;
223 else
224 counter = (int)type;
225
226 isc_stats_increment(stats->counters, (isc_statscounter_t)counter);
227}
228
229static inline void
230update_rdatasetstats(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_rdatastatstype_t rrsettype,
231 bool increment)
232{
233 int counter;
234 dns_rdatatype_t rdtype;
235
236 if ((DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR(rrsettype) &
237 DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_NXDOMAIN) != 0) {
238 counter = rdtypecounter_nxdomain;
239 } else {
240 rdtype = DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_BASE(rrsettype);
241 if (rdtype == dns_rdatatype_dlv)
242 counter = (int)rdtypecounter_dlv;
243 else if (rdtype > dns_rdatatype_any)
244 counter = (int)rdtypecounter_others;
245 else
246 counter = (int)rdtype;
247
248 if ((DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR(rrsettype) &
249 DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_NXRRSET) != 0)
250 counter += rdtypecounter_max;
251 }
252
253 if (increment) {
254 if ((DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR(rrsettype) &
255 DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_STALE) != 0) {
256 isc_stats_decrement(stats->counters, counter);
257 counter += rdtypecounter_stale;
258 }
259 isc_stats_increment(stats->counters, counter);
260 } else {
261 if ((DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR(rrsettype) &
262 DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_STALE) != 0)
263 counter += rdtypecounter_stale;
264 isc_stats_decrement(stats->counters, counter);
265 }
266}
267
268void
269dns_rdatasetstats_increment(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_rdatastatstype_t rrsettype)
270{
271 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) &&
272 stats->type == dns_statstype_rdataset);
273
274 update_rdatasetstats(stats, rrsettype, true);
275}
276
277void
278dns_rdatasetstats_decrement(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_rdatastatstype_t rrsettype)
279{
280 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) &&
281 stats->type == dns_statstype_rdataset);
282
283 update_rdatasetstats(stats, rrsettype, false);
284}
285
286void
287dns_opcodestats_increment(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_opcode_t code) {
288 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) && stats->type == dns_statstype_opcode);
289
290 isc_stats_increment(stats->counters, (isc_statscounter_t)code);
291}
292
293void
294dns_rcodestats_increment(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_rcode_t code) {
295 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) && stats->type == dns_statstype_rcode);
296
297 if (code <= dns_rcode_badcookie)
298 isc_stats_increment(stats->counters, (isc_statscounter_t)code);
299}
300
301/*%
302 * Dump methods
303 */
304void
305dns_generalstats_dump(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_generalstats_dumper_t dump_fn,
306 void *arg, unsigned int options)
307{
308 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) && stats->type == dns_statstype_general);
309
310 isc_stats_dump(stats->counters, (isc_stats_dumper_t)dump_fn,
311 arg, options);
312}
313
314static void
315dump_rdentry(int rdcounter, uint64_t value, dns_rdatastatstype_t attributes,
316 dns_rdatatypestats_dumper_t dump_fn, void * arg)
317{
318 dns_rdatatype_t rdtype = dns_rdatatype_none; /* sentinel */
319 dns_rdatastatstype_t type;
320
321 if (rdcounter == rdtypecounter_others)
322 attributes |= DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_OTHERTYPE;
323 else {
324 if (rdcounter == rdtypecounter_dlv)
325 rdtype = dns_rdatatype_dlv;
326 else
327 rdtype = (dns_rdatatype_t)rdcounter;
328 }
329 type = DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_VALUE((dns_rdatastatstype_t)rdtype,
330 attributes);
331 dump_fn(type, value, arg);
332}
333
334static void
335rdatatype_dumpcb(isc_statscounter_t counter, uint64_t value, void *arg) {
336 rdatadumparg_t *rdatadumparg = arg;
337
338 dump_rdentry(counter, value, 0, rdatadumparg->fn, rdatadumparg->arg);
339}
340
341void
342dns_rdatatypestats_dump(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_rdatatypestats_dumper_t dump_fn,
343 void *arg0, unsigned int options)
344{
345 rdatadumparg_t arg;
346 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) && stats->type == dns_statstype_rdtype);
347
348 arg.fn = dump_fn;
349 arg.arg = arg0;
350 isc_stats_dump(stats->counters, rdatatype_dumpcb, &arg, options);
351}
352
353static void
354rdataset_dumpcb(isc_statscounter_t counter, uint64_t value, void *arg) {
355 rdatadumparg_t *rdatadumparg = arg;
356 unsigned int attributes;
357
358 if (counter < rdtypecounter_max) {
359 dump_rdentry(counter, value, 0, rdatadumparg->fn,
360 rdatadumparg->arg);
361 } else if (counter < rdtypecounter_nxdomain) {
362 counter -= rdtypecounter_max;
363 attributes = DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_NXRRSET;
364 dump_rdentry(counter, value, attributes, rdatadumparg->fn,
365 rdatadumparg->arg);
366 } else if (counter == rdtypecounter_nxdomain) {
367 dump_rdentry(0, value, DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_NXDOMAIN,
368 rdatadumparg->fn, rdatadumparg->arg);
369 } else if (counter < rdtypecounter_stale + rdtypecounter_max) {
370 counter -= rdtypecounter_stale;
371 attributes = DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_STALE;
372 dump_rdentry(counter, value, attributes, rdatadumparg->fn,
373 rdatadumparg->arg);
374 } else if (counter < rdtypecounter_stale + rdtypecounter_nxdomain) {
375 counter -= rdtypecounter_stale + rdtypecounter_max;
376 attributes = DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_NXRRSET |
377 DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_STALE;
378 dump_rdentry(counter, value, attributes, rdatadumparg->fn,
379 rdatadumparg->arg);
380 } else {
381 attributes = DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_NXDOMAIN |
382 DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_STALE;
383 dump_rdentry(0, value, attributes, rdatadumparg->fn,
384 rdatadumparg->arg);
385 }
386}
387
388void
389dns_rdatasetstats_dump(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_rdatatypestats_dumper_t dump_fn,
390 void *arg0, unsigned int options)
391{
392 rdatadumparg_t arg;
393
394 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) &&
395 stats->type == dns_statstype_rdataset);
396
397 arg.fn = dump_fn;
398 arg.arg = arg0;
399 isc_stats_dump(stats->counters, rdataset_dumpcb, &arg, options);
400}
401
402static void
403opcode_dumpcb(isc_statscounter_t counter, uint64_t value, void *arg) {
404 opcodedumparg_t *opcodearg = arg;
405
406 opcodearg->fn((dns_opcode_t)counter, value, opcodearg->arg);
407}
408
409static void
410rcode_dumpcb(isc_statscounter_t counter, uint64_t value, void *arg) {
411 rcodedumparg_t *rcodearg = arg;
412
413 rcodearg->fn((dns_rcode_t)counter, value, rcodearg->arg);
414}
415
416void
417dns_opcodestats_dump(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_opcodestats_dumper_t dump_fn,
418 void *arg0, unsigned int options)
419{
420 opcodedumparg_t arg;
421
422 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) && stats->type == dns_statstype_opcode);
423
424 arg.fn = dump_fn;
425 arg.arg = arg0;
426 isc_stats_dump(stats->counters, opcode_dumpcb, &arg, options);
427}
428
429void
430dns_rcodestats_dump(dns_stats_t *stats, dns_rcodestats_dumper_t dump_fn,
431 void *arg0, unsigned int options)
432{
433 rcodedumparg_t arg;
434
435 REQUIRE(DNS_STATS_VALID(stats) && stats->type == dns_statstype_rcode);
436
437 arg.fn = dump_fn;
438 arg.arg = arg0;
439 isc_stats_dump(stats->counters, rcode_dumpcb, &arg, options);
440}
441
442/***
443 *** Obsolete variables and functions follow:
444 ***/
445LIBDNS_EXTERNAL_DATA const char *dns_statscounter_names[DNS_STATS_NCOUNTERS] =
446 {
447 "success",
448 "referral",
449 "nxrrset",
450 "nxdomain",
451 "recursion",
452 "failure",
453 "duplicate",
454 "dropped"
455 };
456
457isc_result_t
458dns_stats_alloccounters(isc_mem_t *mctx, uint64_t **ctrp) {
459 int i;
460 uint64_t *p =
461 isc_mem_get(mctx, DNS_STATS_NCOUNTERS * sizeof(uint64_t));
462 if (p == NULL)
463 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
464 for (i = 0; i < DNS_STATS_NCOUNTERS; i++)
465 p[i] = 0;
466 *ctrp = p;
467 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
468}
469
470void
471dns_stats_freecounters(isc_mem_t *mctx, uint64_t **ctrp) {
472 isc_mem_put(mctx, *ctrp, DNS_STATS_NCOUNTERS * sizeof(uint64_t));
473 *ctrp = NULL;
474}
